request.description:
> Create new orgainzation with below properties
    1. name
    2. email
 both are
    * required  
    * unique 

> Once created organization we create defaulr user and roles,
    1.  Created new role (supe user) with default permission 
    2.  Created  default user with "email" which we gave in organization creation and password as "test1234",

response.name: 400 Bad Request

request.description:
> Update orgainzation with below properties
    1. name
    2. email
 both are
    * required  
    * unique

response.name: 201 Created
